location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: ‘Operations on 12 April 1915 Sketched from R.H.A. position on No. 8 Picquet Hill Looking Towards Zubair’

mods.abstract: Imprint:General Staff India. S.D.O. No. 1249, June, 1915.Distinctive Features:View of Shaiba battlefield and surrounding area issued as an ‘Appendix C’ to illustrate British military operations on the 12 April 1915 showing the British and enemy forces with landmarks labelled for reference.Bottom right hand corner: ‘(Sd.) H.C. West, Captain R.H.A., Shaiba 18-4-1915’.Marked ‘For Official Use Only’.
